thread.title: Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash

title: Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash
text: EEO Public File Report Sainz ruled fit to race in Russia after heavy crash (AP Photo/Ivan Sekretarev). Course marshals remove the crashed car of Toro Rosso driver Carlos Sainz Jr. of Spain during the third free practice at the 'Sochi Autodrom' Formula One circuit in Sochi, Russia, on Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. A heavy crash for... (AP Photo/Ivan Sekretarev). Course marshals remove the crashed car of Toro Rosso driver Carlos Sainz Jr. of Spain during the third free practice at the 'Sochi Autodrom' Formula One circuit in Sochi, Russia, on Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. A heavy crash for... (AP Photo/Luca Bruno).
